subject: 12.470 Ghost Box System on ebay ($55, 3 day auction)
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Well, the wife says... "Get some of these ghost things out of here!"
So, I have begun putting my 12.470 Ghost Box Systems on ebay.

It cost me about $80 to put this system together, but since I would 
like to get some of these out there for people to test, I put the 
starting bid at only $55 with no reserve and made it a 3 day auction.
Here is the link:
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=170184379226

- Mike
